segments.text: I want to go to the supermarket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a few minutes and I'll go there with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to buy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's check out the fruit section first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'd like some oranges . But they don't look quite ripe yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look , nice fresh cherries ! They are ripe and soft . I'll take some .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go to the snacks section . I want some chocolate and sweets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll go and buy some cakes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to buy something else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Let's go over to the check-out stand .
segments.speaker: S2
